title: Pick a champion and I'll compose a track for them
body:
Whichever champion gets the most suggestions after a day or two will be the one chosen. 

If you guys want the theme to take a certain skin into consideration (ie. Omega Squad Teemo would have a more badass theme than classic Teemo.) then also put the skin name.

EDIT: Ok, so here are the champs that have already been suggested (in no particular order):

Kennen (arctic ops)
Bard
DRRRAAAAAVEN
Zyra
Soraka
Braum
Nautilus
Hecarim
Pantheon
Brand
Yorick
Ahri
Vel'Koz
Kha'Zix
Singed
Alistair
Wukong
Mordekaiser
Vayne
Diana
Leona (iron Solari)
Syndra
Shyvanna
Warwick
Gangplank
Nocturne
Veigar (final Boss)
Lulu
Jinx
Zac
Darius (bioforged)
Karma (order of the lotus)
Azir (galactic)

Thats a LOT of suggestions. Ill wait for a few more comments{{item:3157}}, but I'll be making a list of which one's im gonna do and in what order.



EDIT 2:

Ok, here's the final list:

#1 Arctic Ops Kennen
#2 Ahri
#3 Vel'Koz
#4 Leona (Iron Solari)
#5 Bard
#6 Nautilus
#7 Final Boss Veigar
#8 Diana
#9 Zyra
and #10 will be decided later.

Thanks for all of the requests and I'll do my best to deliver the quality you guys want in a {{summoner:4}}!

As i finish the tracks I'll make a seperate post for each one and link them here as well next to the champion in the list above.

replies.body: {{champion:432}}

That sad moment when people are down voting everyone else's suggestions....

Mine had +2 now it's at 0 

and I look and I see the older suggestions now have 0 while the newer ones still have 1. 

In the name of good sportsmanship within this thread please respect other's suggestions If you enjoy their suggestion gives a +1  but there is no need to down vote a suggestions unless someone is being rude.

Capitalism! {{champion:119}} is the only suggestion that matters!

Im factoring responses to champ suggestions as well so if there's a huge little thread for a single champ (unless its all negative of course) they get bonus points for that. so even though all the {{champion:119}} of the Boards try to get the last hit, they still gotta put in the DPS :D 




... I'm too addicted to this game...

{{champion:143}} : I have never seen any musical love for {{champion:143}}. I've seen tattoos, and mains, but no musical appreciation in the form of league music from any league music creator (falconshield, the yordles, AOD, instalok, etc.)

you know what? youre right! I havent really heard of too much music love for our resident plant-lady!

I might just write a track for Zyra even if she's not the most popular request.
<3 I look forward to it.
Kennen?

Kennen, but it has to be artic ops, because it will be nice to hear a nice ninja mixed with snow music <3
{{champion:85}} {{summoner:32}} do it meow!

EDIT: gotta bump this comment +1
What kind of music are you composing? I need to know the instrumentation before I make a suggestion! Can I get a sample of your work to make a good suggestion?

https://soundcloud.com/atluselectronicmusic/kindred

this is a link to a track i composed for Kindred. Im looking to up my game and just get some more material out. i do everything from classical/romantic era style Piano to New Age to Electronic music (Dubstep, House, etc...) and even some hip hop. i just started posting to this soundcloud so it's only my newest tracks.

I'm always a slut for Diana!  Ahah But something that embodies her active anger might be really cool, instead of the bitter, depressing songs she actually has. Or perhaps just something nice and peaceful, reminiscent of her Lunar Goddess skin?

On the contrary, maybe Leona? She's a ray of sunshine, a beacon of hope, so full of compassion, and has the desire and capability of protecting others. It'd be a nice optimistic song. :) (unlessyouwannaplayonthewholedeadsolarithing)

Besides that, what about something that relates to the sheer magnitude of Syndra's power? Maybe something that could feel like how it felt to have power flowing through you and how it felt to rip a whole building out of the ground.

I also wonder what a theme for Shyvana might sound like. You could possibly try to convey the struggle she likely has with her rage and even nod at the loneliness she feels from having been rejected by both of her heritages. But then I feel like that might sound similar to my Diana suggestion. Hm. Well, at the very least, I would hope these could inspire you, even if only for other things. I hope this doesn't sound too silly, either...

I've already been thinking a lot on Diana and Leona before i posted this, it would be an interesting dynamic to work with. I'd probably use mostly strings for the Leona and Diana's theme (maybe some piano like from my Kindred track sprinkled in there).

Syndra i could see using a lot of low brass and woodwinds with accentuating strings in the background It would probably be super dark sounding but also just massive.

and Shyvanna is one of my favorite champions personally, (she was my go top laner before the meta shifted) I would think that her theme would be full of majesty and pride, while also tinged with that lonliness. Im thinking melodies in mid Brass (trombones, French Horns) but with strings to back it up in the higher register.

I appreciate the suggestions :D
Singed
If only you could do a poll with EVERY SINGLE CHAMPION, but that would take a while. Good luck on your endeavor.
the realization that i couldve done this sunk in and i almost made a repost... I'm such a noob.

I would actually love to do both! to be honest, this whole post is just deciding the order in which im proceeding. my final goal is to get around 20 tracks maybe a few more. Im just trying to decide with this on which do i do first.
I listened to your sample and there is no other option but {{champion:12}}
Time to go listen to Cow's moo for inspiration!

{{champion:421}} It could be a high intensity type theme. Could start with a jaws like theme with the stalking, followed by a part where she pops out of the ground and the massacre begins, with much more action-y type vibe there.

When i think of Rek'Sai, I get an Extreme suspense vibe. (like the jaws theme), but instead of action, i get more of a horrific "Surprise!" feeling from her unburrow. maybe thats just me lol

thanks for the suggestion!
For Vayne the Within Temptation Album fits her pretty well.  Not a fan creation but it fits her so well.
